body.p:
16th
Louisville June 3. 1863
To his excellency
Gov. Robinson
Sir,

permit me to introduce to you my friend C. E. Johnson He has been connected with the sixteenth Kentucky Inf. as one fighting for the unity of his country, and the Honor of the old flag. Mr Johnson is a gentleman of talent, and I am glad that you have given him a position as recruiting officer, for which he is eminently adapted.

Your Obedient Svt
Richard T. Jacob
